FieldChangeSnapshot.name: FieldChangeSnapshot
FieldChangeSnapshot.description: Use this virtual object to learn which opportunities' close dates changed during the specified time period.

CurrentValueDateOnly.description: The current value of a date field on the opportunity.

FieldName.description: The name of the field to get the change history for. Possible values are: CloseDate

ParentId.description: The ID of the opportunity to get the change history for.

ValidFrom.description: The date and time that specifies the beginning of the time period.

ValidTo.description: The date and time that specifies the end of the time period.
